name: Specimen 203
description:
This is a fast-paced platformer oriented towards really good optimization and level and game design. When you get through it, head to the comments section to share your time with others and also your opinions (aproximate duration of 25 minutes).

Someday, if I do even get some donations I will purchase the mobile or the web modules for my game engine and publish it on Play Store or on some browser games site.
